data.title: St. Louis Blues
data.meta_description: The official National Hockey League website including news, rosters, stats, schedules, teams, and video.
data.text:
CONTACT US

By Mail

St. Louis Blues Hockey Club

Enterprise Center

1401 Clark Avenue at Brett Hull Way

St. Louis, MO 63103

By Email

Customer Service: [email protected]

By Phone

Day of event

If you have an urgent question on the day of an event, please call 314-622-5400 to speak to the event receptionist.

Other ways to reach us

Blues Season Tickets: 314-622-2583

Blues Group Sales: 314-622-5454

Blues Suite Sales: 314-589-5284

General Information: 314-622-2500

Ticketmaster: 800-745-3000

Enterprise Center Events Hotline: 314-622-5435

Administrative Offices: 314-622-5400

Guest Service Center: 314-622-5432

Disabled Seating Information: 314-622-5420

Blues Community Relations: 314-552-4551

Charitable Donation Requests: 314-552-4550

EMPLOYMENT & INTERNSHIPS

The St. Louis Blues, Enterprise Center, Stifel Theatre and Levy Restaurants have a wide variety of roles available throughout the year. Full-time benefits include extensive medical coverage, a generous PTO package, 401K with competitive company match, paid holidays and more.
